item.title: Jeemak 74R camera simple firmware extraction
item.author: Author
item.description: This cheap camera is quite terrible, so that’s why it’s been abandoned, ready for me to tinker with. To aid the tinkering, it would help to have the firmware, which thankfully is very easy to extract. Firmware extraction When I plug the camera in, it prompts asking for usb mode. brian@parrot:~$ adb devices List of devices attached 20080411 device As it’s connecting via adb, let’s see if there’s shell access.
